trans-unit.source: To create a volume
trans-unit.target: To create a volume

trans-unit.source: On the device **Quick Start** page, click **Add a volume**.
trans-unit.target: On the device **Quick Start** page, click **Add a volume**.

trans-unit.source: This starts the Add a volume wizard.
trans-unit.target: This starts the Add a volume wizard.

trans-unit.source: In the Add a volume wizard, under **Basic Settings**, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the Add a volume wizard, under **Basic Settings**, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Supply a **Name** for your volume.
trans-unit.target: Supply a **Name** for your volume.

trans-unit.source: Specify the **Provisioned Capacity** for your volume in GB or TB.
trans-unit.target: Specify the **Provisioned Capacity** for your volume in GB or TB.

trans-unit.source: The volume capacity must be between 1 GB and 64 TB for a physical device.
trans-unit.target: The volume capacity must be between 1 GB and 64 TB for a physical device.

trans-unit.source: On the drop-down list, select the **Usage Type** for your volume.
trans-unit.target: On the drop-down list, select the **Usage Type** for your volume.

trans-unit.source: If you are using this volume for archival data, select the **Use this volume for less frequently accessed archival data** check box.
trans-unit.target: If you are using this volume for archival data, select the **Use this volume for less frequently accessed archival data** check box.

trans-unit.source: For all other use cases, simply select **Tiered Volume**.
trans-unit.target: For all other use cases, simply select **Tiered Volume**.

trans-unit.source: (Tiered volumes were formerly called primary volumes).
trans-unit.target: (Tiered volumes were formerly called primary volumes).

trans-unit.source: Add volume
trans-unit.target: Add volume

trans-unit.source: Click the arrow icon
trans-unit.target: Click the arrow icon

trans-unit.source: arrow-icon
trans-unit.target: arrow-icon

trans-unit.source: to go to the next page.
trans-unit.target: to go to the next page.

trans-unit.source: In the **Additional Settings** dialog box, add a new access control record (ACR):
trans-unit.target: In the **Additional Settings** dialog box, add a new access control record (ACR):

trans-unit.source: Supply a **Name** for your ACR.
trans-unit.target: Supply a **Name** for your ACR.

trans-unit.source: Under **iSCSI Initiator Name**, provide the iSCSI Qualified Name (IQN) of your Windows host.
trans-unit.target: Under **iSCSI Initiator Name**, provide the iSCSI Qualified Name (IQN) of your Windows host.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have the IQN, go to [Get the IQN of a Windows Server host](#get-the-iqn-of-a-windows-server-host).
trans-unit.target: If you don't have the IQN, go to [Get the IQN of a Windows Server host](#get-the-iqn-of-a-windows-server-host).

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you enable a default backup by selecting the **Enable a default backup for this volume** check box.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you enable a default backup by selecting the **Enable a default backup for this volume** check box.

trans-unit.source: The default backup will create a policy that executes at 22:30 each day (device time) and creates a cloud snapshot of this volume.
trans-unit.target: The default backup will create a policy that executes at 22:30 each day (device time) and creates a cloud snapshot of this volume.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] After the backup is enabled here, it cannot be reverted.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] After the backup is enabled here, it cannot be reverted.

trans-unit.source: You will need to edit the volume to modify this setting.
trans-unit.target: You will need to edit the volume to modify this setting.

trans-unit.source: Add volume
trans-unit.target: Add volume

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon

trans-unit.source: check icon
trans-unit.target: check icon

trans-unit.source: A volume will be created with the specified settings.
trans-unit.target: A volume will be created with the specified settings.

trans-unit.source: ![Video available](./media/storsimple-create-volume/Video_icon.png) **Video available**
trans-unit.target: ![Video available](./media/storsimple-create-volume/Video_icon.png) **Video available**

trans-unit.source: To watch a video that demonstrates how to create a StorSimple volume, click [here](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/create-a-storsimple-volume/).
trans-unit.target: To watch a video that demonstrates how to create a StorSimple volume, click [here](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/create-a-storsimple-volume/).
